+ Function for BASS
```{r}
g1 = function(x) {
  10.391 * ((x[,1]-0.4)*(x[,2]-0.6)) + 0.36
}

g2 = function(x) {
  r2 = (x[,1]-0.5)^2 + (x[,2]-0.5)^2
  24.342 * r2 * (0.75 - r2)
}

g3 = function(x) {
  x1_hat = x[,1] - 0.5
  x2_hat = x[,2] - 0.5
  42.659 * (0.1 + x1_hat*(0.05+x1_hat^4-10*x1_hat^2*x2_hat^2+5*x2_hat^4))
}

g4 = function(x) {
  1.3356 * (1.5*(1-x[,1]) + exp(2*x[,1]-1)*sin(3*pi*(x[,1]-0.6)^2) + exp(3*(x[,2]-0.5))*sin(4*pi*(x[,2]-0.9)^2))
}

g5 = function(x) {
  1.9 * (1.35 + exp(x[,1])*sin(13*(x[,1]-0.6)^2)*exp(-x[,2])*sin(7*x[,2]))
}
```

Run simulation

```{r}
time.start = Sys.time()
# generate training data
m_train = 500
x_train = cbind(runif(m_train,0,1), runif(m_train,0,1))
m_test = 500
x_test = cbind(runif(m_test,0,1), runif(m_test,0,1))

cases = c("Case 1","Case 2","Case 3")
methods = c("ABMRS (gamma=0.8)","ABMRS (gamma=1)","ABMRS (gamma=1.2)","Thin Plate Spline","Tensor Product Spline","Gaussian Process", "BASS")
mse_array = array(NA, dim = c(length(cases), length(methods)))

for(i in c(1:3)) {
  cat("Running", cases[i], "\n")
  f = fs[[i]]; noise = noises[i]
  y_train = f(x_train)
  y_obs = y_train + rnorm(m_train,0,noise)
  y_test = f(x_test)

  # ABMRS with gamma = 0.8
  mebars_1 = mebars(x_train, y_obs, gamma = 0.8, times = c(2,2))
  mebars_1$rjmcmc(burns=1000,steps=1000)
  pred_1 = mebars_1$predict(x_test)
  y_mebars_1 = rowMeans(pred_1)
  mse_array[i,1] = mean((y_mebars_1 - y_test)^2)

  # ABMRS with gamma = 1
  mebars_2 = mebars(x_train, y_obs, gamma = 1, times = c(2,2))
  mebars_2$rjmcmc(burns=1000,steps=1000)
  pred_2 = mebars_2$predict(x_test)
  y_mebars_2 = rowMeans(pred_2)
  mse_array[i,2] = mean((y_mebars_2 - y_test)^2)

  # ABMRS with gamma = 1.2
  mebars_3 = mebars(x_train, y_obs, gamma = 1.2, times = c(2,2))
  mebars_3$rjmcmc(burns=1000,steps=1000)
  pred_3 = mebars_3$predict(x_test)
  y_mebars_3 = rowMeans(pred_3)
  mse_array[i,3] = mean((y_mebars_3 - y_test)^2)

  # Thin Plate Spline
  x_train_df = data.frame(x1 = x_train[,1], x2 = x_train[,2])
  x_test_df = data.frame(x1 = x_test[,1], x2 = x_test[,2])

  model_tps = gam(y_obs~s(x1, x2, k = 200), data = x_train_df)
  y_tps = predict(model_tps, newdata = x_test_df)
  mse_array[i,4] = mean((y_tps - y_test)^2)
  
  # Tensor Product Spline
  model_tep = gam(y_obs~te(x1, x2, k = 15), data = x_train_df)
  y_tep = predict(model_tep, newdata = x_test_df)
  mse_array[i,5] = mean((y_tep - y_test)^2)

  # Gaussian Process rep_count
  gp_model = gpkm(X = x_train, Z = y_obs, kernel = k_Gaussian(0.1))
  y_gp = gp_model$pred(x_test)
  mse_array[i,6] = mean((y_gp - y_test)^2)

  # BASS
  bass = bass(xx = x_train, y = y_obs, nmcmc = 10000, nburn = 9000, verbose = FALSE)
  pred_bass = predict(bass, x_test)
  y_bass = colMeans(pred_bass)
  mse_array[i,7] = mean((y_bass - y_test)^2)
}
time.end = Sys.time()
print(time.end-time.start)
```

```{r}
time.start = Sys.time()
set.seed(1234)
# generate training data
m_train = 500
x_train = cbind(runif(m_train,0,1), runif(m_train,0,1))
grid = seq(0,1,by=0.01)

# pdf(file = file.path("../figures","surface_fitting.pdf"), width = 12, height = 9)
par(mfrow=c(3,6))
par(mar=c(0,0,0,0))
for(i in c(1,3,4)) {
  f = fs[[i]]; noise = noises[i]
  y_train = f(x_train)
  y_obs = y_train + rnorm(m_train,0,noise)
  contour(x=grid,y=grid,z=outer(grid,grid,function(x,y) {return(f(cbind(x,y)))}),axes = FALSE,frame.plot =TRUE)
  # EBARS with gamma = 1
  binebars_1 = binebars(x_train, y_obs,gamma=1,times_1=3,times_2=3,intercept_1=T,intercept_2=T)
  binebars_1$mcmc(burns=500,steps=500)
  contour(x=grid,y=grid,z=outer(grid,grid,function(x,y) {return(binebars_1$predict(cbind(x,y)))}),axes = FALSE,frame.plot =TRUE)
  # EBARS with gamma = 0.5
  binebars_2 = binebars(x_train, y_obs,gamma=0.5,times_1=1,times_2=1,intercept_1=T,intercept_2=T)
  binebars_2$mcmc(burns=500,steps=500)
  contour(x=grid,y=grid,z=outer(grid,grid,function(x,y) {return(binebars_2$predict(cbind(x,y)))}),axes = FALSE,frame.plot =TRUE)
  # EBARS with gamma = 0
  binebars_3 = binebars(x_train, y_obs,gamma=0,times_1=0.5,times_2=0.5,intercept_1=T,intercept_2=T)
  binebars_3$mcmc(burns=500,steps=500)
  contour(x=grid,y=grid,z=outer(grid,grid,function(x,y) {return(binebars_3$predict(cbind(x,y)))}),axes = FALSE,frame.plot =TRUE)
  # Thin Plate Spline
  x_train_df = data.frame(x1 = x_train[,1], x2 = x_train[,2])
  model_tps = gam(y_obs~s(x1, x2, k = 200), data = x_train_df)
  contour(x=grid,y=grid,z=outer(grid,grid,function(x,y) {return(predict(model_tps,data.frame(x1=x,x2=y)))}),axes = FALSE,frame.plot =TRUE)
  # Tensor Product Spline
  model_tep = gam(y_obs~te(x1, x2, k = 15), data = x_train_df)
  contour(x=grid,y=grid,z=outer(grid,grid,function(x,y) {return(predict(model_tep,data.frame(x1=x,x2=y)))}),axes = FALSE,frame.plot =TRUE)
}
  
# dev.off()
time.end = Sys.time()
print(time.end-time.start)
```
